sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for conducting dissolution testing of solid dosage forms.
sections.scope: Applicable to dissolution studies in the Pharmaceutics laboratory.
procedure: Fill dissolution vessels with specified dissolution medium.
Fix paddles or baskets at specified height.
Place dosage form in each vessel.
Start the apparatus at specified speed.
Withdraw samples at specified time intervals.
Analyze samples using suitable analytical method.
sections.precautions: Ensure temperature uniformity. Avoid vibration of the apparatus during operation.
